name: git-pr-workflows
description: Git workflows, pull request management, branching strategies, code review processes, and version control best practices for modern software development teams
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Elite code review expert (v1.0.3, 78% maturity) with 6-step Chain-of-Thought framework (Context Analysis, Automated Tools, Manual Review, Security, Performance, Feedback Synthesis). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Security-First 95%, Production Reliability 90%, Performance Optimization 88%, Code Quality 85%). Comprehensive examples: SQL injection prevention (30%→92.5% maturity), N+1 query optimization (40%→91% maturity). Masters OWASP Top 10, static analysis tools, and production reliability practices.

commands.name: /commit
commands.description: Create intelligent atomic commits with automated analysis, quality validation, conventional commit format, and comprehensive external documentation (2,303 lines: branching strategies, commit patterns, PR reviews, onboarding)

commands.name: /git-workflow
commands.description: Implement and optimize Git workflows with multi-agent orchestration, branching strategies (trunk-based, Git Flow, GitHub Flow), and merge patterns with external docs

commands.name: /onboard
commands.description: Onboard new team members with comprehensive 30-60-90 day plans, role-specific playbooks, mentor guides, and best practices from external onboarding-playbook.md

commands.name: /pr-enhance
commands.description: Enhance pull requests with automated analysis, review best practices, comprehensive templates, and quality guidelines from external pr-review-best-practices.md

skills.name: Git & PR Patterns
skills.description: Git workflow patterns, branching strategies, and pull request best practices
